extension.summary: Artwork Helper provides a couple of tools to skins and other add-ons for working with artwork.
extension.description: Artwork Helper provides a couple of tools to skins and other add-ons for working with artwork. See README.md for detailed usage.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork Helper does not directly add functionality on its own and must be supported by skins or other add-ons.
